title: Fundamentals of Design
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of design. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Fundamentals of Dynamics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in dynamics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Systems
description: In-depth analysis of systems principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Intermediate Thermodynamics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in thermodynamics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Controls
description: In-depth analysis of controls principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Innovation
description: Advanced exploration of innovation covering current research and industry practices.

title: Design
description: In-depth analysis of design principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Special Topics in Materials
description: Comprehensive study of materials with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Special Topics in Analysis
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of analysis. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Advanced Design
description: In-depth analysis of design principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
